hero_section.title: AI/ML Models
hero_section.subtitle: Predictive Power for Smarter Business
hero_section.description: We design and deploy artificial intelligence and machine learning models that transform your data into actionable insights, driving automation, forecasting, and personalized experiences.

introduction_section.heading: What is
content: At Devisgon, we build custom AI/ML models that fit your unique business needs. Unlike generic plug-and-play tools, our models are trained on your real data, ensuring accuracy and relevance. We also deploy them into production-ready environments with monitoring pipelines, so they stay reliable over time.
Our solutions are used across finance, retail, healthcare, logistics, SaaS, and e-commerce — helping organizations achieve efficiency, growth, and innovation.

key_benefits_section.title: Key Benefits
key_benefits_section.subtitle: Transform your operations with proven results

cards.title: Continuous Improvement
cards.description: Models learn and improve as new data arrives.

cards.title: Personalized Experiences
cards.description: Deliver content and offers tailored to each user.

cards.title: Smarter Decisions
cards.description: Turn raw data into automated recommendations.

cards.title: Accurate Forecasting
cards.description: Predict demand, revenue, or risks with precision.

what_you_get_section.title: What you'll get when you choose  AI/ML Models

list_items.title: 1.Custom-Trained AI/ML Models
list_items.description: Custom-trained AI/ML models (classification, regression, clustering, NLP, vision)

list_items.title: 2. Seamless API Integration
list_items.description: API endpoints for easy integration into apps or systems

list_items.title: 4.Performance Monitoring Dashboards

technologies_section.title: We work with modern, proven technologies
technologies_section.subtitle: Industry-leading tools for maximum reliability and performance

process_section.title: Our Process
process_section.subtitle: From concept to launch in 6 weeks

steps.title: Discover
steps.description: Define use cases, gather data, and identify ML opportunities.

steps.title: Design
steps.description: Data preprocessing, feature engineering, model architecture.

steps.title: Launch
steps.description: Deploy models with monitoring and retraining pipelines.

problem.label: Problem
problem.text: An e-commerce client wanted to improve product recommendations but relied on static rules.

solution.label: Solution
solution.text: We built a recommendation engine using collaborative filtering and customer purchase history.

result.label: Result
result.text: Conversion rates increased by 18%, average cart value grew by 22%, and user engagement rose significantly.

questions.question: Can you build apps for both iOS and Android?
questions.answer: Typically, an MVP can be developed in 4-6 weeks depending on the complexity of the features.

questions.question: How secure are your enterprise solutions?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer post-launch maintenance and support packages to ensure your application runs smoothly.

questions.question: Do you work with existing ERP/CRM systems?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We specialize in integrating AI models into existing architectures via API.

questions.question: Can you scale apps as our business grows?
questions.answer: We primarily use Next.js, React, Node.js, Python, and cloud services like AWS or Vercel.
